### Load packages and data

```{r load-packages, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse) 
library(dsbox) 
```

```{r load-data, message = FALSE}
states <- read_csv("data/states.csv")
```

### Exercise 1

```{r dataset dimensions}

nrow(states)
ncol(states)

```

There are 51 rows and 3 columns. Each row contains a single states (including D.C.), and the variables include the entire state name, the abbreviation, and the area of the state.
